button.name: action_start_contract
button.help: Click here to start the contract so that it can be available in other business processes

button.name: action_to_renew
button.help: Set the contract status as 'To Renew'. Or, the contract will be set to 'To Renew' automatically when its End Date is between tomorrow and the next 7 days, OR its employee's Visa Expire Date is between tomorrow and the next 60 days.

button.name: set_as_close
button.help: Click here to set the contract as Expired. The contract will also be closed automatically when its End Date or its employee's Visa Expire Date is earlier or equal to tomorrow.

button.name: action_cancel
button.help: Click here to cancel the contract

button.name: action_set_to_draft
button.help: Click here to set contract to New
